channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [BOOKKEEPER-97] collect pub/sub/consume statistics on hub server
item.summary: collect pub/sub/consume statistics on hub server

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: new patch rebased on trunk. it also include BOOKKEEPER-99, exposing the statistics thru JMX.

-----------------------------------------------------------
This is an automatically generated e-mail. To reply, visit:
https://reviews.apache.org/r/4308/
-----------------------------------------------------------

Review request for bookkeeper.

Summary
-------

collecting pub/sub/consume statistics on hub server and expose them thru JMX.

the patch is based on BOOKKEEPER-96, includes BOOKKEEPER-99, exposing statistics thru JMX.

This addresses bug BOOKKEEPER-97.
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BOOKKEEPER-97

Diffs
